name: Derpengine
tagline: A small shader-based OpenGL scene graph engine.
body:
What?
=====
derpengine compiles and runs on Linux and Windows, uses modern OpenGL and so far implements following features:
* Extensible scene graph
* Dynamic shadow maps
* (Static) environment maps
* Bumpmapping of unparametrized meshes
* Heightmap based terrain
It is also licensed on the MIT License, so you can do pretty much anything with it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
